content:
Hook, Line, and Sinker Bait & Tackle is a great choice! They're likely to have a wide selection of gear and knowledgeable staff to help you out.

As for silver spinnerbaits, they're a popular choice for Lake Winnebago, and I'm sure Hook, Line, and Sinker will carry a variety of options. They might have some similar to what you used on Lake Michigan, but keep in mind that the fish in Lake Winnebago might have different preferences.

When you visit the bait shop, be sure to ask the staff about their recommendations for spinnerbaits. They can give you insight into what's been working well on the lake, and might even have some local favorites that you haven't tried before. They might suggest different sizes, colors, or blade configurations that are specifically effective for Lake Winnebago's walleye and bass.

If they don't have the exact same spinnerbait you used on Lake Michigan, don't worry! This is a great opportunity to try something new and experiment with different presentations. You might discover a new favorite lure or technique that'll help you catch more fish.

Remember to also ask about any local fishing regulations, such as size limits or catch restrictions, to ensure you're prepared for your trip.

Have fun shopping for gear and getting ready for your Lake Winnebago adventure!
